cause.description:
Environment California investigates problems, crafts solutions, educates the public and decision-makers, and helps Californians make their voices heard in local, state and national debates over the quality of our environment and our lives.
1. California should use more clean energy.
2. California should have clean air.
3. California should protect its forests.
4. California should improve its environmental health.
cause.mission: Environment California works to protect California's air, water and open spaces.
cause.name: Environment California
